Function.Description: The closeLog function closes the log file after an calling the openLog function.

Brief.Overview: The closeLog function stops writing the an open log file. It may have a string argument as a note that will be written at the end of the log file. If there is no opened log file this function returns false.
Brief.Usage: Use the closeLog function to close the log file opened using openLog.

Argument.Name: aNote
Argument.Note: Optional information to be written to the log.

Syntax.Return: Returns the Boolean value true, or false if an error occurred. This function will also return false if thre is no opened log file.
